section.title: Create or edit a tracked entity type

listitem.para: Open the Maintenance app and click Program > Tracked entity type.
Click the add button or an already exsisting tracked entity type.
Type a Name of the tracked entity.
(Optional) select a Color and an Icon that will be used by the data capture apps to identify this tracked entity type.
(Optional) Enter a Description of the tracked entity.

(Optional) Enter a Minimum number of attributes required to search. This specifies the amount of attributes that need to be filled out in order to be able to search for this tracked entity type in a global search. See Configure Search for more information.

(Optional) Enter a Maximum number of tracked entity instances to return in search. This specifies the amount of tracked entity instances that will be returned in a global search. See Configure Search for more information.
(Optional) Add Tracked entity type attributes. This is used to configure search, see Configure Search for more information.
(Optional) Enter an Alternative name of the tracked entity.
